CustomField.formula: IF ( BLANKVALUE( APXT_CongaSign__CompletedOn__c, NOW() ) >= APXT_CongaSign__RequestedOn__c , CEILING( BLANKVALUE( APXT_CongaSign__CompletedOn__c, NOW() ) - APXT_CongaSign__RequestedOn__c ), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Conga Sign Transaction Completed Date - Conga Sign Transaction Created Date. Returns minimum value of 1 day and integer value.
CustomField.label: Duration Days
